       <path d="M333 60.5c0-1.9 1.6-3.5 3.5-3.5s3.5 1.6 3.5 3.5-1.6 3.5-3.5 3.5-3.5-1.6-3.5-3.5zm6.4 0c-.1-1.6-1.4-2.9-3-2.8-1.6.1-2.9 1.4-2.8 3 .1 1.6 1.3 2.8 2.9 2.8 1.6 0 2.9-1.3 2.9-2.8v-.2zm-1.2 1.9h-.6l-1.1-1.8h-.9v1.8h-.5v-3.9h1.7c1 0 1.4.4 1.4 1s-.5 1-1.2 1.1l1.2 1.8zm-1.8-2.1c.5 0 1.3.1 1.3-.7 0-.6-.5-.7-1-.7h-1.1v1.4h.8zM331 63h-9.8V36.9c0-5.1-2.9-7.1-7-7.1-4.5 0-8.7 3-8.7 10.6V63H296V21.4h9.5v6.1h.2c2.3-4.1 6.6-7.5 12.2-7.5 7.8 0 13.2 4.3 13.2 13.7L331 63zm-38-21c0 13.6-9.2 22-20.6 22S252 56 252 42.1c0-14 9.1-22.1 20.4-22.1S293 28.3 293 42zm-10 .1c0-8.7-4.2-13.5-10.6-13.5s-10.6 5-10.6 13.4c0 8.2 4.2 13.4 10.6 13.4S283 50.3 283 42.1zm-31.5-29.5c-.1 3-2.7 5.4-5.7 5.3-2.9-.1-5.2-2.4-5.3-5.3-.1-3 2.3-5.6 5.3-5.7 3-.1 5.6 2.3 5.7 5.3v.4zM241 22h10v42h-10V22zm-2 39.3c-2.5 1.6-4.6 2.7-10 2.7-7.6 0-11.8-4.4-11.8-14.6V29.9H212v-8.1h5.2V11.5L227.6 7v14.8h10.6V30h-10.6v18.4c0 4.8 1.1 6.7 3.9 6.7 1.7 0 3.4-.5 4.8-1.3l2.7 7.5zM210 63h-9.8V36.9c0-5.1-2.9-7.1-7-7.1-4.5 0-8.6 3-8.6 10.6V63H175V21.4h9.5v6.1h.2c2.3-4.1 6.6-7.5 12.2-7.5 7.8 0 13.2 4.3 13.2 13.7L210 63zm-65.7-25.1c1.1-6.5 5.7-9.2 10.1-9.2 5.8 0 9.1 4.1 9.2 9.2h-19.3zm9-17.9c-12.1 0-19.3 9-19.3 22 0 13.4 8.6 22 20.9 22 8 0 12.1-1.1 15.7-3.8l-2.8-8c-3.1 1.9-6.6 3-12.2 3-7.4 0-11.1-5.4-11.4-9.9H173c.5-14.7-3.9-25.3-19.7-25.3zM97 22h11.2l9.5 28.6 9.1-28.6H137l-14.5 42h-11.1L97 22zm3 23.2H71.2c.3 4.5 4 9.9 11.4 9.9 5.6 0 9.1-1 12.2-3l2.8 8c-3.7 2.7-7.8 3.8-15.7 3.8C69.6 64 61 55.5 61 42c0-13.1 7.2-22 19.3-22 15.8 0 20.2 10.6 19.7 25.2zm-9.4-7.3c-.1-5.1-3.4-9.1-9.2-9.1-4.4 0-9 2.7-10.1 9.1h19.3zM64 20.9l-2.1 9.7c-1.2-.4-2.4-.6-3.6-.6-8.3 0-8.5 7.8-8.5 10.1V63H40V21.4h9.7v6.4h.2c1.9-4.9 5-7.7 9.6-7.7 1.5-.1 3.1.2 4.5.8zm-26 1.5c0 17.3-12.4 22.4-27 22.4V63H0V1.4C5 .6 10 .1 15.1 0 27.5 0 38 5.6 38 22.4zm-11.1 0c0-9.7-5.3-13-12.2-13-1.1 0-2.3.3-3.6.4v25.4c8.3.4 15.8-2.4 15.8-12.8z">

       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          COLORFUL COOKING
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="e19750c0-4c2b-4485-9bac-cc19eeee4d5a" data-vars-block-slot="2" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item pork-tenderloin-roasted-grapes-cabbage-recipe image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="COLORFUL COOKING" data-vars-position="1" href="/food-nutrition/recipes/a35633849/pork-tenderloin-roasted-grapes-cabbage-recipe/">

       <div class="custom-item-no-image custom-item how-to-reverse-prediabetes no-image">
        <div class="custom-item-inner">
         <div class="custom-item-content">
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Big Story 5" data-vars-position="1" href="/health/a34255185/how-to-reverse-prediabetes/">

         <div class="custom-item how-to-deal-with-grief column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="MENTAL HEALTH MATTERS" data-vars-position="5" href="/health/mental-health/a35379156/how-to-deal-with-grief/">

        <div class="custom-item mexican-cookbooks">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="The Latest" data-vars-position="12" href="/food-nutrition/g35866917/mexican-cookbooks/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mexican-cookbooks-1616097959.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.253xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/prevention/assets/css/homepage.8a207bc.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/prevention/assets/css/homepage-mobile.195a9a3.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
